value.definition: Date when document expires/ends. Date format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ. null allowed.
value.name: Life time end

value.definition: Metadata is to be interpreted as "main" metadata in a collection of similar metadata.
value.name: Main

value.definition: Specifies type of document.
value.name: Type

value.definition: Published state of document, i.e. there is a version of the article that is published. Valid values are true/false.
value.name: Has been published

value.definition: The Uniform Resource Identifier of the document.
value.name: URI

value.definition: The Uniform Resource Locator of the document.
value.name: URL

value.definition: Publication start date of the document. Date format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ.
value.name: Publication start

value.definition: Publication stop date of the document. Date format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ.
value.name: URL

valueList.definition: Infomaker entity types. Note that x-im is suffixed with a "/" (slash) followed by the actual type, e.g. x-im/author.
valueList.name: Infomaker entity types

value.definition: Used for categories/subjects. Example: News, Sport, Food.
value.name: Category

value.definition: Used for concepts that are to be viewed as ”keywords” or ”tag” but is not a ”person”, ”organisation” or an ”event”. Example: Car, Climate, Indictment, ADHD.
value.name: Topic

value.definition: Used for concepts that are ”person” tags. Example: Carl Lewis, Isaac Asimov.
value.name: Person

value.definition: Used for concepts that are ”organisation” tags. Example: EU, FIFA, UN.
value.name: Organisation

value.definition: Concepts typically used as parameters in publication algorithms. Also called ”function tags”. Example: Live, Breaking News.
value.name: Content Profile

value.definition: Concepts used to represents geographical positions and areas. Example: Borås, County of Västra götaland, Sweden.
value.name: Place

value.definition: Concepts representing events. Example: World Health Summit 2018.
value.name: Event

value.definition: Concepts representing authors and photographers. Example: Nils Olsson, Stina Andersson.
value.name: Author

value.definition: Concept typically used to create series of articles. Example: metoo, Elections USA, NHL 17/18.
value.name: Story

value.definition: Concept representing organizational departments. Example: Sport, Culture.
value.name: Section

value.definition: Concept defining publication channels. Example: company.com, app.
value.name: Section

value.definition: NewsItem representing "text" (article).
value.name: Article

value.definition: NewsItem representing "picture" (image).
value.name: Image

value.definition: NewsItem representing pdf.
value.name: PDF

value.definition: PlanningItem representing entities used for planning editorial work.
value.name: News coverage

value.definition: Score (prio), lifetime and lifetime end date for article. For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.newspriority.
value.name: News value

value.definition: Print information belonging to article. Maps to page (print) related fields for article.
value.name: Print information

value.definition: Print information belonging to article. Maps to page (print) related fields for article.
value.name: Teaser

value.definition: Article source represents the "source", e.g. TT, Writer, of the article. For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.textanalyzer.
value.name: Article Source

value.definition: Crop defines softcrop used for an image. For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.ximimage.
value.name: Crop

value.definition: Used for embedded youtube content. For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.youtubeembed.
value.name: Youtube

value.definition: Used for IFramely content. For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.iframely.
value.name: IFramely

value.definition: Represent content parts, e.g. "Fact box". For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.contentpart.
value.name: Content Part

value.definition: Used for links to Facebook. For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.socialembed.
value.name: Facebook

value.definition: Used for links to Twitter. For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.socialembed.
value.name: Twitter

value.definition: Represents contact information for a "person" or an "organization" for example. For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.ximconcept.
value.name: Contact Information

value.definition: Represents tagging of "contact profile". For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.ximconcept (Content Profile).
value.name: Contact Information

value.definition: Represents geo data - polygon. For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.ximconcept.
value.name: Polygon

value.definition: Represents geo data - position. For more information, see plugin se.infomaker.ximconcept.
value.name: Position

value.definition: Represents planning details. For more information, see PlanningItem.
value.name: Planning Details

value.definition: Represents event details. For more information, see ConceptItem (Event).
value.name: Planning Details
